short_summary: Markido software is the only known commercially available software that can meet all of the mandatory requirements of the contract.
description: This ACAN relates to 1 contract proposed to be awarded to 1 contractor. A contract is proposed for 3 years with 2 option years to provide a commercially available Engage software to Shared Services Canada (SSC) on behalf of Other Government Departments (OGDs).
tags: Trade Agreement *World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA","Trade Agreement *Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA","Trade Agreement *Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP","Trade Agreement *Quebec-New Brunswick Procurement Agreement
